pr_title: Add Unit Tests for the New Order transaction.

timeline.message:
Add Unit Tests for the New Order transaction.

Summary:
This unit test ensures that the NewOrder transaction populates the
correct tables properly. It does this by initializing the values of the
required tables to a fixed known value, executing the transaction with
known arguments and ensuring that the tables are populated with the
required values.

Reviewers:
Mihnea
